item.title: Nobunaga’s Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition announced for PS5, Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/nobunagas-ambition-awakening-complete-edition-announced-for-ps5-switch-2

  • PS5
  • Switch 2

Due out on June 5.

Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Kou Shibusawa have announced Nobunaga’s Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition for PlayStation 5 and Switch 2. It will launch alongside the Switch 2 hardware on June 5.

Here is an overview of the game, via Koei Tecmo:

In Kou Shibusawa’s historical simulation, Nobunaga’s Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition, players must learn the finer points of both military might and political cunning. A culmination of the series’ 40-year history, players attempt to accomplish Nobunaga Oda’s unachieved ambition to unify Japan through a series of escalating war strategies and diplomacy. Optimized for the Nintendo Switch 2 system, including Joy-Con 2 mouse controls, the game not only features DLC from the original title, but also includes six new scenarios along with climactic Decisive Battles. Launch joint offenses with allies, break through the frontlines en route to enemy castles, and appoint officers to influence both political and economic strategies as players experience the life of a daimyo—a powerful Japanese leader—in the troubled times of the Warring States Period, 16th century Japan.

item.title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment announced for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/hyrule-warriors-age-of-imprisonment-announced-for-switch-2

Publisher Nintendo and Koei Tecmo subsidiary AAA Games Studio have announced Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment for Switch 2. It will launch this winter.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment is the newest title in the Hyrule Warriors series and is developed by Koei Tecmo Games with support from Nintendo. The game features epic battles against hordes of enemies as it tells the untold story from Hyrule’s distant past of the Imprisoning War that ultimately led to the events of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom. Fans of the Legend of Zelda series and players of both The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild and The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom can experience the thrill of battle and this canonical tale featuring Princess Zelda, King Rauru, and other familiar characters. Fight for Hyrule’s future when Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment launches.

item.title: Street Fighter 6 coming to Switch 2 on June 5 alongside Years 1-2 Fighters Edition
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/street-fighter-6-coming-to-switch-2-on-june-5-alongside-years-1-2-fighters-edition

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Years 1-2 Fighters Edition includes all fighters and stages released through Years 1 and 2.

Capcom will release a Switch 2 version of Street Fighter 6 alongside the hardware’s launch on June 5, the company announced.

On the same day, a Street Fighter 6 Years 1-2 Fighters Edition will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam, including all characters and stages released through Years 1 and 2.

Here is an overview of the Switch 2 version and Years 1-2 Fighters Edition, via Capcom:

Street Fighter 6 Brings Fierce Competition to the Nintendo Switch 2!

Capcom’s iconic fighting game franchise is ready to hit the streets once again with the release of Street Fighter 6 on the Nintendo Switch 2! Launching on June 5, 2025, fighters will get to experience all the heart-pounding action and thrilling combat, while on the go. Whether you’re a seasoned veteran or newcomer, prepare to jump into a brawl anywhere, anytime, and immerse yourself in the next level of fierce street fighting competition.

New Modes and Features for Every Fighter

  • Local Wireless Match – One on One brings all of your favorite Street Fighter 6 characters to the forefront for serious bouts against any rival via Local Wireless mode! Challenge your friends who also have the Nintendo Switch 2 and test your skills in epic showdowns.
  • Local Avatar Match – Bring your personalized fighter to life in Avatar Matches, newly added in Local Wireless mode. Play as your custom avatar from World Tour and use newly acquired moves you’ve learned during your journey.

Fun, Unique Ways to Battle with Friends

  • Tabletop Mode – Share the excitement with friends using the Joy-Con and enjoy Street Fighter 6 in tabletop mode. Classic, Modern, and Dynamic control types have been configured for the Joy-Con 2, making it a perfect opportunity to battle it out anywhere.
  • Gyro Battle – Get ready to shake things up with Gyro Battles. Using the Joy-Cons, two players can battle it out using dynamic motion controls, all while following the same rules as one-on-one matches.
  • Calorie Contest – Step up your game in the Street Fighter 6 Calorie Contest Mode! This unique and fun twist enables players to use their Joy-Cons to perform various actions, such as landing attacks and performing Super Arts that will build up Calorie Gauges. It’s a contest that challenges both your strength and endurance!
  • ❮
  • ❯

Collectible amiibo and amiibo Cards

  • New amiibo Figures and Cards – Street Fighter 6 will be releasing collectable amiibo figures of fan-favorite characters Luke, Jamie, and Kimberly, available at launch alongside the release of the Nintendo Switch 2. You can also grab collectible amiibo cards with the Starter Pack featuring all 22 characters from Street Fighter 6 through Year 1. Booster packs will also be available in the future, with new characters and designs. These amiibo figures and cards can be loaded into the game, unlocking exclusive in-game content.
  • Customizable amiibo Figures and Cards – Take customization to the next level with amiibo interactions. Customize and save your character’s outfit and button settings to the amiibo figures/cards and load them immediately into the game. You can also use the Ryu and Ken amiibo figures from Super Smash Bros.™ for even more fun.
  • Rewards – Each figure and card you collect, including the Ryu and Ken amiibo figures from Super Smash Bros., unlocks a range of exclusive rewards. For both amiibo figures and cards, you will receive character-specific device wallpapers and photo frames. Furthermore, amiibo figure owners will also receive exclusive BGM, Device Wallpaper, and Photo Frame!

A New Edition for the Perfect Way to Play

The Street Fighter 6 Years 1-2 Fighters Edition will be available on June 5, 2025, across all platforms including PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC via Steam, and the new Nintendo Switch 2. This edition includes the characters and stages released through Years 1 & 2, making it a total of 26 characters including their Outfit 1, Colors 3-10, and 20 stages. Standard Edition is also coming to Nintendo Switch 2!

More details about Street Fighter 6 on the Nintendo Switch 2 will be shared soon, but for now stay tuned on all the latest information on the official Street Fighter 6 website!

Street Fighter 6 is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC vis Steam.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon 2 announced for Switch 2, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/enter-the-gungeon-2-announced-for-switch-2-pc

  • PC
  • Switch 2

Now in active development.

Publisher Devolver Digital and developer Dodge Roll have announced roguelike action game sequel Enter the Gungeon 2 for Switch 2 and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Devolver Digital:

Teased by Dodge Roll’s Dave Crooks during today’s Nintendo Switch 2 showcase, Enter the Gungeon 2 is a reloaded, high-caliber sequel to the iconic bullet hell dungeon crawler, reinforced with a new 3D art style, new weapons and enemies and expanded gameplay.

Battle through areas familiar and unknown as the ruined Gungeon reveals its secrets to those brave enough to enter. Discover, unlock and master fantastic weaponry within its procedurally generated halls and destroy the legions of Gundead pouring forth from within.

Charge into dynamic battles against devilishly cute enemies, previously confined to the 2D plane, and delight as they are knocked around, tossed into the air and thrown deep into pits.

Choose from an expanding roster of Gungeoneers full of both familiar and new faces as you rescue and extract marooned heroes from the depths of the Gungeon. Become mighty through unexpected combinations of powerful passive items, explosive active items, blessings, curses and your own mastery over an impressive armory of weapons.

And seek to understand why you find yourself under assault in the Gungeon once again…

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Elden Ring Tarnished Edition announced for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/elden-ring-tarnished-edition-announced-for-switch-2

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer FromSoftware have announced Elden Ring Tarnished Edition for Switch 2. It will launch in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

Elden Ring Tarnished Edition is an all-in-one version that includes the base game ELDEN RING as well as the major downloadable content “Shadow of the Erdtree.” The title will also feature new armor, weapons and customization features for Torrent’s appearance. The additional content in the title will also be available on other platforms.

Elden Ring and its expansion “Shadow of the Erdtree” are currently available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam.

  • Switch 2

Due out in 2026.

FromSoftware has announced The Duskbloods, a multiplayer action game coming exclusively to Switch 2 in 2026. It is directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

The moontears will flow for one and one alone in The Duskbloods, a brand-new multiplayer title from the creators of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, FromSoftware. Available exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2, The Duskbloods launches next year.

A “Creator’s Voice” developer diary series with the game’s director Hidetaka Miyazaki will be published on April 4.

item.title: Nintendo announces three-versus-three sports game Drag x Drive for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/nintendo-announces-three-versus-three-sports-game-drag-x-drive-for-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Utilizes Joy-Con 2 controllers' new mouse controls.

Nintendo has announced Drag x Drive, a three-versus-three sports game for Switch 2 that utilizes the Joy-Con 2 controllers’ new mouse controls. It will launch this summer.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

Use the Joy-Con 2 mouse controls and enjoy a new experience by strapping into Drag x Drive. A new online three-versus-three game experience, Drag x Drive (pronounced “Drag and Drive”) challenges players to use the mouse controls with both Joy-Con 2 at the same time to intuitively steer, speed up, perform tricks and make plays such as dunks. Get ready to gear up when Drag x Drive launches.
